post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Greetings from Computech Corporation!
I came across your resume on one of the job boards and was following up to see if you would be interested in taking up an opportunity with one of our clients.
The job requirement details are mentioned below and if it does perk your interest please do send me the latest word copy of your resume and also I would really appreciate if you could send me your best contact number and the best time, then I shall surely call you following that to discuss more on the position and see if we could take it a step further in the process.
Need for Java/J2ee Web Application developer Work Location: Toronto, ON ,Canada Duration: Contract
Required Skills: - Good knowledge of WebApps - Java development - 4 Years Plus - JSP and J2EE - Configuration Management Experience - Able to work with custom Java code and able to document it - Understanding of Oracle useful and OAF. - Understanding of ERDBMS - Understanding of inventory management - Experience of telecoms
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ If you are Interested, please Send me your UPDATED RESUME along with the details mentioned below:::
1) Full Name : 2) Present Location : 3) INS Status (Canadian Citizen/permanent Residency): 4) Ready to Relocate (Yes/No) : 5) Total Experience : 6) Availability : 7) Contact Details (Tel/Cell &Email) : 8) Comfort Levels (on a scale of 1[Least] to 10[High]): 9) Salary Expectations (hourly) :
Thx,
Kaladhar Pendli Computech Corporation Tel: 248-247-1545 E 7110 Fax: 248-479-0873 kaladhar.pendli@computechcorp.com www.computechcorp.com
post.title: Java/J2ee Web Application developer
